metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9120 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: PHP 7.x through 7.1.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (buffer overflow and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a long string because of an Integer overflow in mysqli_real_escape_string.

notes.Note: leosilva> unfixed upstream as of 2020-10-05 rodrigo-zaiden> php7.0 retriage on 2022-02-01 found that upstream fixed it on 2021-08-09, information is now updated to reflect this.

criterions.comment: php5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
